Ennis City Commission Ward 4

### [Ward 4 Map Click to access Voting Wards GIS Map](https://gissolutions.halff.com/portal/apps/sites/#/ennis/app/90587bcbe9524ab5bc3570302906d806)

### **Shirley Watson, City Commissioner, Ward 4**

Shirley Watson is currently serving her third term as Commissioner for Ward 4.  She was elected for her first term in May 2017 and re-elected to serve again in May 2020.  Commissioner Watson graduated from G.W. Carver High School, Madame CJ Walker College, and the Integrity Seminary with a bachelor's degree in Christian Leadership and Community Organization.  She has served on the Parks and Recreation Board and the Ennis Housing Authority.

﻿Mrs. Watson (widowed) is the mother of three boys, Phillip, Frederick, and Patrick, and one daughter, Charlotte. She enjoys traveling, gardening, and serving her community wherever needed.

### 

Contact: [**Email**](mailto:ward4@ennistx.gov)

Commissioner Watson was elected for her first term in May 2017 and re-elected to serve again in May 2020.
